item.title: Strength and Weakness
item.description: Strength: technical savvy. Weakness: there are still lots to learn. Learn programming codes on the job. had few presentation opportunities at work, but practiced the skillset at Toastmasters. syllable missing. I have done a self-assessment for data scientists and data analysts. Strength: I am a good listener. I am focused on getting tangible business results with data. no problem of talking in front of a group.

item.title: Strength and Weakness
item.description: What would you say are your strengths and weaknesses? Syllables
